Legal.termsSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service
Legal.privacySubtitle: Your privacy is important to us
Legal.termsIntroduction: Welcome to Brain Rot Factory. These Terms of Service govern your use of this hosted demonstration instance of our open source AI-powered entertainment platform. By accessing or using this service, you agree to be bound by these terms.
Legal.termsAcceptance: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use this hosted service. However, you are always free to download and use the open source code to host your own instance.
Legal.openSourceNoticeText: Brain Rot Factory is an open source project. The complete source code is freely available and you can download, modify, and host your own instance. This hosted service is provided as a demonstration of the project's capabilities.
Legal.serviceDescriptionText: This hosted instance of Brain Rot Factory is an open source AI-powered entertainment platform that offers:
Legal.serviceFeature1: Interactive conversations with AI characters inspired by Italian brain-rot culture
Legal.serviceFeature2: Text-to-speech functionality for enhanced user experience
Legal.serviceFeature4: Rate-limited access to ensure fair usage for all users
Legal.serviceFeature5: Free access to the complete source code for self-hosting
Legal.userResponsibilitiesText: As a user of our service, you agree to:
Legal.userRule1: Use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms
Legal.userRule2: Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service
Legal.userRule3: Not use the service to generate harmful, illegal, or inappropriate content
Legal.userRule4: Respect the intellectual property rights of others
Legal.userRule5: Not circumvent any rate limiting or security measures
Legal.intellectualPropertyText: Brain Rot Factory is an open source project released under the MIT License. While the source code is freely available for anyone to use, modify, and distribute, this hosted demonstration instance and its specific content, features, and functionality are provided by us.
Legal.userContentRights: You retain ownership of any content you provide to this hosted service, but grant us a license to use it as necessary to provide our services. If you host your own instance using our open source code, you maintain full control over your data and content.
Legal.openSourceLicenseText: The Brain Rot Factory source code is available under the MIT License. You can find the complete source code, license terms, and contribution guidelines at: https://github.com/rodrigogs/vibecode-playground
Legal.privacyDataProtectionText: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
Legal.lgpdCompliance: We comply with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD) and respect your rights regarding your personal data.
Legal.limitationsLiabilityText: This hosted demonstration instance of Brain Rot Factory is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
Legal.disclaimerText: AI-generated content may not always be accurate or appropriate. Use at your own discretion. This is a demonstration instance - for production use, please consider hosting your own instance using our open source code.
Legal.terminationText: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the service at any time, with or without notice, for any reason including violation of these Terms.
Legal.governingLawText: These Terms are governed by the laws of Brazil. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of São Paulo, SP.
Legal.changesTermsText: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website.
Legal.contactInformationText: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
Legal.privacyIntroduction: This Privacy Policy describes how this hosted demonstration instance of Brain Rot Factory collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our AI-powered entertainment platform.
Legal.privacyCommitment: We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD). Note that this policy applies only to this hosted instance - if you use the open source code to host your own instance, you will be responsible for your own privacy practices.
Legal.hostedInstanceNoticeText: This privacy policy applies specifically to this hosted demonstration instance. The Brain Rot Factory project is open source, and you can download and host your own instance where you maintain complete control over data collection and privacy practices.
Legal.lgpdNoticeText: This Privacy Policy complies with the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (Lei Geral de Proteção de Dados - LGPD). As a data subject, you have specific rights regarding your personal data, which are detailed below.
Legal.authDataDesc: When you sign in with GitHub, we collect your GitHub username, email address, and public profile information
Legal.usageDataDesc: Chat messages, character preferences, session data, and interaction patterns
Legal.technicalDataDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, and access logs
Legal.analyticsDataDesc: Aggregated usage statistics and performance metrics
Legal.performanceDataDesc: Error logs and system performance data
Legal.legalBasisIntro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds under LGPD:
Legal.consentDesc: For optional features like analytics and marketing communications
Legal.contractDesc: To provide the core services you've requested
Legal.legitimateInterestDesc: For security, fraud prevention, and service improvement
Legal.legalObligationDesc: When required by Brazilian law or legal authorities
Legal.useData1: Provide and maintain our AI conversation service
Legal.useData3: Generate personalized AI responses and maintain conversation context
Legal.useData4: Implement rate limiting and prevent abuse
Legal.useData5: Improve our service quality and user experience
Legal.useData6: Comply with legal obligations and respond to legal requests
Legal.dataSharingIntro: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data only in the following circumstances:
Legal.serviceProvidersDesc: Third-party services like AI providers (OpenAI, DeepSeek) and hosting services
Legal.legalRequirementsDesc: When required by law, court order, or government authorities
Legal.businessTransferDesc: In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets (with prior notice)
Legal.dataStorageSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
Legal.securityMeasure1: Encryption in transit and at rest
Legal.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy:
Legal.accountDataRetention: Retained while your account is active, deleted upon account closure
Legal.chatDataRetention: Session data deleted immediately after conversation, no permanent storage
Legal.analyticsDataRetention: Aggregated data retained for up to 2 years for service improvement
Legal.cacheDataRetention: Temporary storage for performance, automatically deleted within 24 hours
Legal.yourRightsIntro: Under LGPD, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
Legal.rightAccessDesc: Request information about what personal data we process about you
Legal.rightCorrectionDesc: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
Legal.rightDeletionDesc: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal obligations)
Legal.rightPortabilityDesc: Request your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Legal.rightWithdrawConsentDesc: Withdraw consent for processing based on consent
Legal.rightComplaintDesc: File a complaint with ANPD (Brazilian Data Protection Authority)
Legal.rightInformationDesc: Receive clear information about data processing activities
Legal.exerciseRightsText: Contact our Data Protection Officer at rodrigo.smscom@gmail.com. We will respond within 15 days as required by LGPD. For general inquiries about the open source project, please visit: https://github.com/rodrigogs/vibecode-playground
Legal.cookiesTrackingText: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
Legal.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for authentication and basic functionality
Legal.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us understand how you use our service (with your consent)
Legal.internationalTransfersText: Some of our service providers may be located outside Brazil. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place and transfers comply with LGPD requirements.
Legal.childrensPrivacyText: Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe we have collected data from a child, please contact us immediately.
Legal.changesPrivacyText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
Legal.contactInformationPrivacyText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your rights:
Legal.anpdContactText: You can also file a complaint directly with ANPD at https://www.gov.br/anpd/

About.title: About Brain-rot Factory
About.subtitle: A vibe coding adventure
About.introduction: Welcome to the story behind Brain-rot Factory - a project born from the collaboration between human creativity and AI assistance.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.description: This project represents a unique coding adventure where developer Rodrigo Gomes and GitHub Copilot worked together to create something truly special.

collaboration.title: Human-AI Collaboration
collaboration.description: Brain-rot Factory is the result of an intense collaboration between human vision and artificial intelligence. Together, we explored the boundaries of what's possible when creativity meets technology.
highlights: Real-time problem solving with AI assistance
Creative solutions emerging from human-AI synergy
Learning and adapting together throughout the process

development.title: Development Process
development.description: Every line of code, every design decision, and every feature was crafted through collaborative discussion and refinement.
features: Next.js 15 with App Router for modern web development
TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience
Tailwind CSS for responsive and beautiful UI

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe in the power of collaboration - not just between humans, but between humans and AI. This project demonstrates that the future of development lies in partnership, not replacement.

human.name: Rodrigo Gomes
human.description: Brazilian developer passionate about creating meaningful digital experiences. Brings years of expertise in full-stack development and a vision for innovative user interactions.

ai.name: GitHub Copilot
ai.description: AI assistant that helped shape every aspect of the project, from architecture decisions to implementation details, always learning and adapting to create the best possible outcome.

impact.title: Impact & Learning
impact.description: This project taught us valuable lessons about the future of software development and the potential of human-AI collaboration.
lessons: AI can enhance human creativity without replacing it
Collaborative development leads to better solutions
Real-time feedback accelerates the development process
The combination of human intuition and AI efficiency is powerful
Open source projects benefit from diverse perspectives

future.title: Looking Forward
future.description: Brain-rot Factory is just the beginning. We're excited to see how this project evolves and what new adventures await in the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence.

acknowledgments.title: Acknowledgments
acknowledgments.description: Special thanks to the open source community, the creators of the amazing tools we used, and everyone who believes in the power of collaborative innovation.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This project is open source and available on GitHub. We encourage contributions, feedback, and forks. Let's build the future together!
